FeaturesHow It Works

CV/Resume Builder

Build, Sign, and Manage Your Professional Documents

Key Features

Easy CV Builder

Intuitive editor to create and update your CV with multiple sections and live preview.

Digital Security

Sign your CV with electronic or digital signatures. Add watermarks, QR codes, and barcodes for verification.

Version Control

Track changes and revisions. Download secure PDF versions for sharing and printing.

Admin Management

Admins can manage users, activate/deactivate accounts, and ensure system integrity.

Cloud Storage

Securely store and access your CVs from anywhere. Automatic backups and version history.

Analytics & Reports

Track CV downloads, views, and sharing statistics. Get insights into your document engagement.

How It Works

1

Register and activate your account via email.

2

Login with OTP for enhanced security.

3

Build and customize your CV with profile, sections, and signatures.

4

Generate secure PDFs with embedded QR/barcodes and watermarks.

5

Download, share, and verify your documents.
